name: Homethings
description: The home & personal playground built using TypeScript, Next JS & Postgres. The app features a number of toy projects including a personal to do app, document storage, a personalised AI Chatbot as well as others.

name: Webiliti
description: The web testing app built using Go & JavaScript. The Go app has the majority of the functionality with a few JavaScript serverless api routes to handle a few specific browser based tasks. The app runs a number of tests on a given page to allow a user to track web performance over time.

name: Finly & Umda
description: Finly is a personal finance app built using Go, Fiber & Postgres. The app is designed to help users track their spending and money habits. Umda is a companion API that holds relevant market data for the app.
